entry.title: CCSCodeStandard
entry.summary:
CCSCodeStandard enforces consistent VB.NET coding & naming standards via Roslyn analyzers and automated fixes.

Core features:

  • Type based variable/field prefixes (int, str, dt, obj, etc.) with field/const modifiers (g/m, gc/mc)
  • Missing 'As' clause detection with quick + combined fixes
  • Automatic default value initialization (locals/fields)
  • Implicit For Each variable typing & renaming (adds As & correct prefix, updates usages)
  • SQL CommandText 'dbo.' prefix enforcement
  • Short name (len <=3) expansion suggestions
  • Bulk Fix window: select / filter / apply & save all fixes at once

Compatible with Visual Studio 2019-2022 and .NET Framework projects
